claim: This was the height of Monteverdi's "Marino period"; six of the pieces in the book are settings of the poet's verses.

claim_translated: Dette var høydepunktet i Monteverdis «Marino-periode»; seks av stykkene i boken er tonesetninger av dikterens vers.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Som Carter uttrykker det, omfavnet Monteverdi Marinos madrigalske kyss og kjærlighetsbitt med «... den entusiasmen som var typisk for perioden».

subsequent_sentence_translated: Da han våkner i leiligheten sin, hører han på radioen en bekreftelse på at hun faktisk er død i den virkelige verden.

claim: The social organization of ruffed lemurs is widely variable in both group organization and group composition, although no notable difference can be seen between the two species.
title: Ruffed lemur
subsequent_sentence: Ruffed lemurs are typically described as multi-male groups with a fission-fusion social structure, although this can vary by season and locality.
claim_translated: Den sosiale organiseringen av kragelemurer er svært varierende, både i gruppeorganisering og gruppekomposisjon, selv om det ikke kan sees noen merkbar forskjell mellom de to artene.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Kragelemurer beskrives vanligvis som grupper med flere hanner og en fisjon-fusjon sosial struktur, selv om dette kan variere etter årstid og sted.

claim: It was in this period that American poet Hart Crane leapt to his death from Orizaba.
title: USS Orizaba
previous_sentence: By the early 1930s, Orizaba's typical route had remained virtually the same, though Nassau and Tampico were dropped as ports of call.
subsequent_sentence: At around noon on 27 April 1932, while the ship was headed to New York—some 275 miles (443 km) north of Havana and 10 miles (16 km) off the Florida coast—Crane, clad in pajamas and overcoat, climbed the rail at the stern of the ship and plunged into the ocean.
previous_sentence_translated: Tidlig på 1930-tallet var Orizabas typiske rute praktisk talt den samme, selv om Nassau og Tampico ble droppet som anløpshavner.
claim_translated: Det var i denne perioden den amerikanske poeten Hart Crane hoppet i døden fra Orizaba.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Rundt middagstid den 27. april 1932, mens skipet var på vei til New York – omtrent 443 km nord for Havana og 16 km utenfor Floridas kyst – klatret Crane, iført pyjamas og frakk, over rekka akterut på skipet og stupte ut i havet.

claim: In 1819, Lancashire was represented by two county members of parliament (MPs) and a further twelve borough members sitting for the towns of Clitheroe, Newton, Wigan, Lancaster, Liverpool, and Preston, with a total of 17,000 voters in a county population of nearly a million.
title: Peterloo Massacre

subsequent_sentence_translated: Takket være avtaler mellom Whig- og Tory-partiene om å dele setene mellom seg, hadde de fleste ikke opplevd et omstridt valg i levende minne.

claim: In its report, the committee noted that the bill included the standardized language it advocated because of past commemorative coin abuses: including that they be issued by only one mint and no fewer than 5,000 at a time, have only one design, be struck within a year of enactment, and bear the date 1936 even if struck later.
title: Lynchburg Sesquicentennial half dollar
previous_sentence: On April 22, Alva B. Adams of Colorado reported it back to the Senate.
subsequent_sentence: The committee recommended the bill pass.

claim: A strong trough turned the hurricane to the north and northeast into an area of strong vertical shear, and Paul weakened to a tropical storm on October 24, later passing just south of the Baja California Peninsula.
title: 2006 Pacific hurricane season
previous_sentence: Paul attained hurricane status on October 23, and later that day it reached its peak intensity of 105 mph (170 km/h), a strong Category 2 hurricane on the Saffir–Simpson scale.

claim_translated: En sterk tråg dreide orkanen mot nord og nordøst inn i et område med sterk vertikal skjær, og Paul svekket seg til en tropisk storm den 24. oktober, og passerte senere like sør for Baja California-halvøya.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Paul svekket seg til en tropisk depresjon 25. oktober, et lite stykke utenfor kysten av Mexico, og etter å ha snudd seg bort fra kysten en kort stund, nådde den land i det nordvestlige Sinaloa 26. oktober.

claim: Congress did not want to alarm the people of Quebec, and rejected these arguments.

previous_sentence_translated: Arnold og Allen la begge frem argumenter for den andre kontinentalkongressen om at Quebec kunne og burde tas fra britene, og påpekte at britene kunne bruke Quebec som et oppstillingsområde for angrep nedover Lake Champlain og inn i Hudson River-dalen.
claim_translated: Kongressen ønsket ikke å skremme befolkningen i Quebec, og avviste disse argumentene.
subsequent_sentence_translated: I juli, midt i bekymringene om at britene kunne bruke Quebec som base for militære bevegelser inn i New York, endret de sin posisjon og godkjente en invasjon av Quebec via Lake Champlain, og tildelte oppgaven til generalmajor Philip Schuyler fra New York.

claim: In 1870, when distinguishing the notion of fatherland from that of nation and applying the latter to the region of Syria, Marrash would point to the role played by language, among other factors, in counterbalancing religious and sectarian differences, and thus, in defining national identity.
title: Francis Marrash
previous_sentence: In this work, Marrash expressed ideas of political and social reforms, highlighting the need of the Arabs for two things above all: modern schools and patriotism "free from religious considerations".
previous_sentence_translated: I dette verket uttrykte Marrash ideer om politiske og sosiale reformer, og fremhevet arabernes behov for to ting fremfor alt: moderne skoler og patriotisme "fri for religiøse hensyn".
claim_translated: I 1870, da han skilte begrepet fedreland fra nasjon og anvendte sistnevnte på regionen Syria, pekte Marrash på rollen som språk, blant andre faktorer, spilte i å motvirke religiøse og sekteriske forskjeller, og dermed i å definere nasjonal identitet.

claim: SR 78 from I-5 to I-15, and from the eastern junction with SR 86 to the eastern junction with SR 111 is part of the National Highway System (NHS), a network of highways that are considered essential to the country's economy, defense, and mobility by the Federal Highway Administration.
title: California State Route 78
previous_sentence: The section of SR 78 from the western junction of SR 79 to the western junction with SR 86 is designated by the California State Legislature as eligible by law for the State Scenic Highway System; however, only the section in Anza-Borrego Desert State Park has officially been designated by Caltrans as being part of the system, meaning that it is a substantial section of highway passing through a "memorable landscape" with no "visual intrusions", where the potential designation has gained popular favor with the community; it gained this status in 1971.
subsequent_sentence: In 2013, SR 78 had an annual average daily traffic (AADT) of 670 between the San Diego–Imperial county line and the western SR 86 junction, and 163,000 between Twin Oaks Valley Road and Nordahl Road, the latter of which was the highest AADT for the highway.
previous_sentence_translated: Strekningen av SR 78 fra den vestlige krysset med SR 79 til den vestlige krysset med SR 86 er av California State Legislature utpekt som lovmessig kvalifisert for State Scenic Highway System. Imidlertid er det bare strekningen i Anza-Borrego Desert State Park som offisielt er utpekt av Caltrans som en del av systemet. Dette betyr at det er en betydelig motorveistrekning som passerer gjennom et «minneverdig landskap» uten «visuelle inngrep», der den potensielle utnevnelsen har vunnet folkelig støtte i lokalsamfunnet. Den fikk denne statusen i 1971.
claim_translated: SR 78 fra I-5 til I-15, og fra den østlige krysset med SR 86 til den østlige krysset med SR 111 er en del av National Highway System (NHS), et nettverk av motorveier som anses som viktige for landets økonomi, forsvar og mobilitet av Federal Highway Administration.
subsequent_sentence_translated: I 2013 hadde SR 78 en gjennomsnittlig årlig daglig trafikk (ÅDT) på 670 mellom fylkesgrensen mellom San Diego og Imperial og den vestlige SR 86-krysset, og 163 000 mellom Twin Oaks Valley Road og Nordahl Road, hvor sistnevnte var den høyeste ÅDT-verdien for motorveien.

claim: Such is their attractiveness that, in Borneo, even the body of a dead pitta can be a favoured toy for local children.
title: Pitta
previous_sentence: The brilliant plumage of many pittas has resulted in considerable interest in pittas from people living within their range, scientists, aviculturists and birdwatchers, and has led to the colloquial name jewel-thrushes.
subsequent_sentence: They have proven difficult to maintain and breed in captivity, requiring large amounts of space, humidity and sufficient vegetation of the right kind.

subsequent_sentence: Dante wins their battle, but Phantom escapes and swears revenge before Dante eventually impales and kills him.
previous_sentence_translated: Dante utforsker slottet, bekjemper demoner tilkalt av Mundus for å angripe ham, og overvinner alle slags utspekulerte gåter, feller og triks.
claim_translated: Han får også tak i to magiske våpen, et sverd kalt Alastor og et par hansker kjent som Ifrit, og møter den første av Mundus' tjenere, en gigantisk edderkopp/skorpiondemon kjent som Phantom.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Dante vinner kampen, men Phantom slipper unna og sverger hevn før Dante til slutt spidder og dreper ham.

claim: Cabbage appears among vegetables directed to be cultivated in the Capitulare de villis, composed in 771–800 AD, that guided the governance of the royal estates of Charlemagne.
title: Cabbage
previous_sentence: At the end of Antiquity cabbage is mentioned in De observatione ciborum ("On the Observance of Foods") by Anthimus, a Greek doctor at the court of Theodoric the Great.
previous_sentence_translated: På slutten av antikken nevnes kål i De observatione ciborum («Om observasjon av mat») av Anthimus, en gresk lege ved hoffet til Theodoric den store.
claim_translated: Kål er blant grønnsakene som skal dyrkes i Capitulare de villis, som ble skrevet i 771–800 e.Kr., og som veiledet styringen av Karl den stores kongelige eiendommer.

claim: When House's team attempts to perform an MRI on Adler, they discover that House's authorization for diagnostics has been revoked; Cuddy restores his authorization in exchange for his working at the clinic.

claim_translated: Da Houses team forsøker å utføre en MR-undersøkelse på Adler, oppdager de at Houses autorisasjon for diagnostikk er blitt inndratt. Cuddy gjenoppretter autorisasjonen hans i bytte mot at han jobber på klinikken.

claim: ... The wellborn babe was Ralph; your Captain was the other."

claim: The large Lelwel hartebeest has dark stripes on the front of its legs.

subsequent_sentence_translated: Cokes hartebeest er moderat stor, med et kortere panneområde og lengre hale sammenlignet med de andre underartene.

claim: The suggested names were recommended for acceptance by the IUPAC Inorganic Chemistry Division; formal acceptance was set to occur after a five-month term following publishing of the declaration expires.
title: Tennessine
previous_sentence: In June 2016, IUPAC published a declaration stating the discoverers had submitted their suggestions for naming the new elements 115, 117, and 118 to the IUPAC; the suggestion for the element 117 was tennessine, with a symbol of Ts, after "the region of Tennessee".
subsequent_sentence: In November 2016, the names, including tennessine, were formally accepted.
previous_sentence_translated: I juni 2016 publiserte IUPAC en erklæring som slo fast at oppdagerne hadde sendt inn sine forslag til navn på de nye elementene 115, 117 og 118 til IUPAC; forslaget for element 117 var tennessin, med symbolet Ts, etter «regionen Tennessee».
claim_translated: De foreslåtte navnene ble anbefalt for godkjenning av IUPACs avdeling for uorganisk kjemi; formell godkjenning skulle skje etter en fem måneders periode etter at publiseringen av erklæringen utløp.
subsequent_sentence_translated: I november 2016 ble navnene, inkludert tennessin, formelt godkjent.

claim: Stephen Trigg married Mary Christian, daughter of another Virginia pioneer, Israel Christian.

claim: He also moved the NFB entirely over to color film production.

subsequent_sentence_translated: Martin Knelman i Toronto Star mente imidlertid at Newman var «fast i politisk krigføring og administrativt kaos».

claim: Jeremy Signor of USgamer agreed that Knight Lore felt more like a world than a painting and added that the game's innovative use of successive, single-screen rooms pre-dated The Legend of Zelda by years.
title: Knight Lore
previous_sentence: Though isometric games had existed previously, in a retrospective review, Gillen (Rock, Paper, Shotgun) recalled that Knight Lore was the first game to offer a "world" with physical depth for exploration as opposed to the simple mechanics of arcade games.
subsequent_sentence: Gillen said the game's punishing style (unforgiving gameplay, high difficulty, awkward controls) had become obsolete in the 30 years since its release and criticised Knight Lore as "enormously innovative, incredibly atmospheric, and totally unplayable", suggesting that the similar Head over Heels (1987) had aged much better.
previous_sentence_translated: Selv om isometriske spill hadde eksistert tidligere, husket Gillen (Rock, Paper, Shotgun) i en retrospektiv anmeldelse at Knight Lore var det første spillet som tilbød en «verden» med fysisk dybde for utforskning i motsetning til den enkle mekanikken i arkadespill.
claim_translated: Jeremy Signor fra USgamer var enig i at Knight Lore føltes mer som en verden enn et maleri, og la til at spillets innovative bruk av suksessive rom på én skjerm var flere år eldre enn The Legend of Zelda.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Gillen sa at spillets straffende stil (utilgivende spilling, høy vanskelighetsgrad, klønete kontroller) hadde blitt foreldet i de 30 årene siden utgivelsen, og kritiserte Knight Lore som «enormt innovativt, utrolig atmosfærisk og fullstendig uspillbart», og antydet at det lignende Head over Heels (1987) hadde tålt tidens tann mye bedre.

claim: Japan's constitution prohibits racial and religious discrimination, and the country is a signatory to numerous international human rights treaties.
title: Japan
previous_sentence: Japanese society traditionally places a strong emphasis on collective harmony and conformity, which has led to the suppression of individual rights.
subsequent_sentence: However, it lacks any laws against discrimination based on race, ethnicity, religion, sexual orientation, or gender identity and does not have a national human rights institution.
previous_sentence_translated: Det japanske samfunnet har tradisjonelt lagt stor vekt på kollektiv harmoni og konformitet, noe som har ført til undertrykkelse av individuelle rettigheter.
claim_translated: Japans grunnlov forbyr rase- og religionsdiskriminering, og landet har undertegnet en rekke internasjonale menneskerettighetstraktater.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Imidlertid mangler det lover mot diskriminering basert på rase, etnisitet, religion, seksuell legning eller kjønnsidentitet, og det har ikke en nasjonal menneskerettighetsinstitusjon.

claim: Ali Shadman (Ali Nadhaif) is one of the few Kurdish people remaining in Baghdad.

subsequent_sentence_translated: Forsvarerne ville dermed kunne sette i gang et motangrep og gjenerobre tapt territorium.

claim: The player is then taken to a dark room with Anita sitting on a chair, peeling and eating oranges.

claim: Lupin pooh-poohs this notion.

claim: On September 8, 1935, Long traveled to the State Capitol to pass a bill that would gerrymander the district of an opponent, Judge Benjamin Pavy, who had held his position for 28 years.
title: Huey Long
subsequent_sentence: At 9:20 p. m., just after passage of the bill effectively removing Pavy, the judge's son-in-law, Carl Weiss, approached Long, and, according to the generally accepted version of events, fired a single shot with a handgun from four feet (1.2 m) away, striking Long in the torso.
claim_translated: Den 8. september 1935 reiste Long til delstatshovedstaden for å få vedtatt et lovforslag som ville endre valgdistriktet til en motstander, dommer Benjamin Pavy, som hadde hatt stillingen sin i 28 år.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Klokken 21.20, like etter at lovforslaget som effektivt fjernet Pavy, dommerens svigersønn, ble vedtatt, henvendte dommerens svigersønn, Carl Weiss, seg til Long, og ifølge den allment aksepterte versjonen av hendelsene avfyrte han et enkelt skudd med en pistol fra 1,2 meters avstand, som traff Long i overkroppen.

claim: On 26 November 1901, Leno, along with Seymour Hicks and his wife, the actress Ellaline Terriss, was invited to Sandringham House to take part in a Royal Command Performance to entertain King Edward VII, Queen Alexandra, their son George and his wife, Mary, the Prince and Princess of Wales.
title: Dan Leno
previous_sentence: He also made 14 short films towards the end of his life, in which he portrayed a bumbling buffoon who struggles to carry out everyday tasks, such as riding a bicycle or opening a bottle of champagne.
subsequent_sentence: Leno performed a thirty-five-minute solo act that included two of his best-known songs: "How to Buy a House" and "The Huntsman".
previous_sentence_translated: Han lagde også 14 kortfilmer mot slutten av livet, der han portretterte en klønete klovn som sliter med å utføre hverdagsoppgaver, som å sykle eller åpne en flaske champagne.
claim_translated: Den 26. november 1901 ble Leno, sammen med Seymour Hicks og hans kone, skuespillerinnen Ellaline Terriss, invitert til Sandringham House for å delta i en kongelig forestilling for å underholde kong Edward VII, dronning Alexandra, deres sønn George og hans kone, Mary, prinsen og prinsessen av Wales.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Leno fremførte et solostykke på trettifem minutter som inkluderte to av hans mest kjente sanger: «How to Buy a House» og «The Huntsman».

claim: Specifically, they noted that Fagan had largely and inaccurately plagiarised his article from an earlier account of Anning's life and work by Dorset native Henry Rowland Brown, from the second edition of Brown's 1859 guidebook, The Beauties of Lyme Regis.
title: Mary Anning
previous_sentence: The profile, "Mary Anning, The Fossil Finder," was long attributed to Dickens himself but, in 2014, historians of palaeontology Michael A. Taylor and Hugh Torrens identified Henry Stuart Fagan as the author, noting that Fagan's work was "neither original nor reliable" and "introduced errors into the Anning literature which are still problematic."
subsequent_sentence: The article emphasised the difficulties Anning had overcome, especially the scepticism of her fellow townspeople.
previous_sentence_translated: Profilen «Mary Anning, The Fossil Finder» ble lenge tilskrevet Dickens selv, men i 2014 identifiserte paleontologihistorikerne Michael A. Taylor og Hugh Torrens Henry Stuart Fagan som forfatteren, og bemerket at Fagans arbeid var «verken originalt eller pålitelig» og «introduserte feil i Anning-litteraturen som fortsatt er problematiske».
claim_translated: Mer spesifikt bemerket de at Fagan i stor grad og unøyaktig hadde plagiert artikkelen sin fra en tidligere beretning om Annings liv og arbeid av Henry Rowland Brown, som var fra Dorset, fra den andre utgaven av Browns guidebok fra 1859, The Beauties of Lyme Regis.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Artikkelen la vekt på vanskelighetene Anning hadde overvunnet, spesielt skepsisen fra sine medborgere.

claim: In his Dream Pool Essays (1088), Shen Kuo wrote:
title: Science and technology of the Song dynasty
previous_sentence: Although the drydock had been known in Ptolemaic Egypt since the late 3rd century BCE (by a Phoenician; not used again until Henry VII of England in 1495), the scientist and statesman Shen Kuo wrote of its use in China to repair boats during the 11th century.
previous_sentence_translated: Selv om tørrdokken hadde vært kjent i det ptolemaiske Egypt siden slutten av det 3. århundre f.Kr. (av en føniker; ikke brukt igjen før Henrik VII av England i 1495), skrev vitenskapsmannen og statsmannen Shen Kuo om bruken av den i Kina for å reparere båter i løpet av det 11. århundre.
claim_translated: I sine *Drømmebasseng-essays* (1088) skrev Shen Kuo:

claim: They called themselves Les Apaches – roughly "The Hooligans" – to represent their status as "artistic outcasts".
title: Claude Debussy
previous_sentence: From around 1900 Debussy's music became a focus and inspiration for an informal group of innovative young artists, poets, critics, and musicians who began meeting in Paris.
subsequent_sentence: The membership was fluid, but at various times included Maurice Ravel, Ricardo Viñes, Igor Stravinsky and Manuel de Falla.
previous_sentence_translated: Fra rundt 1900 ble Debussys musikk et fokus og en inspirasjon for en uformell gruppe innovative unge kunstnere, poeter, kritikere og musikere som begynte å møtes i Paris.
claim_translated: De kalte seg Les Apaches – omtrent «Bøllene» – for å representere sin status som «kunstneriske utstøtte».
subsequent_sentence_translated: Medlemskapet var flytende, men inkluderte til forskjellige tider Maurice Ravel, Ricardo Viñes, Igor Stravinsky og Manuel de Falla.

claim: He is discovered by Balthier and Fran, a pair of sky pirates looking for the magicite.
title: Final Fantasy XII
previous_sentence: In the treasury he finds a piece of magicite, a powerful magical crystal.
subsequent_sentence: The three escape as Dalmascan Resistance forces assault the palace, and in the sewers they meet the Resistance leader, Amalia, before being captured by Archadian forces.
previous_sentence_translated: I skattkammeret finner han et stykke magisitt, en kraftig magisk krystall.
claim_translated: Han blir oppdaget av Balthier og Fran, et par himmelpirater som leter etter magiskjær.
subsequent_sentence_translated: De tre rømmer når Dalmascans motstandsbevegelse angriper palasset, og i kloakken møter de motstandsbevegelsens leder, Amalia, før de blir tatt til fange av Archadiske styrker.

claim: President Bush remarked, "The destruction from this storm goes beyond anything we have known in recent years," but noted that damage was less severe than in Florida.
title: Hurricane Andrew
previous_sentence: On August 26, George H. W. Bush toured devastated areas of Louisiana with Governor Edwin Edwards.
subsequent_sentence: After his visit to Louisiana, President Bush declared only Terrebonne Parish as a disaster area, but later included 34 other parishes under this declaration.
previous_sentence_translated: Den 26. august besøkte George H.W. Bush ødelagte områder i Louisiana sammen med guvernør Edwin Edwards.
claim_translated: President Bush bemerket: «Ødeleggelsene fra denne stormen overgår alt vi har sett de siste årene», men bemerket at skadene var mindre alvorlige enn i Florida.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Etter besøket i Louisiana erklærte president Bush bare Terrebonne Parish som katastrofeområde, men inkluderte senere 34 andre menigheter under denne erklæringen.

claim: He explains that he and Norrell are studying magic together and intend to learn to remove the Darkness they are both trapped in, but will adventure into other worlds in the meantime.
title: Jonathan Strange & Mr Norrell
previous_sentence: Two months later, Strange has a conversation with Arabella, who is still living in Padua.
subsequent_sentence: Neither wishes to take Arabella to Faerie again, so he instead promises to return to her when he has dispelled the Darkness and tells her not to be a widow till then, to which she agrees.
previous_sentence_translated: To måneder senere har Strange en samtale med Arabella, som fortsatt bor i Padua.
claim_translated: Han forklarer at han og Norrell studerer magi sammen og har til hensikt å lære å fjerne mørket de begge er fanget i, men at de i mellomtiden vil dra på eventyr til andre verdener.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Ingen av dem ønsker å ta Arabella med til Faerie igjen, så han lover i stedet å komme tilbake til henne når han har drevet bort mørket og ber henne om ikke å være enke før den tid, noe hun samtykker i.

claim: While he is often regarded as a designer of mechanical devices, Archimedes also made contributions to the field of mathematics, both in applying the techniques of his predecessors to obtain new results, and developing new methods of his own.
title: Archimedes
claim_translated: Selv om han ofte blir ansett som en designer av mekaniske innretninger, bidro Arkimedes også til matematikkfeltet, både ved å anvende teknikkene til sine forgjengere for å oppnå nye resultater, og ved å utvikle nye metoder.

claim: Now that she has no intention of honouring the agreement of her passport, which was to return to South Africa within a year, she openly introduces herself as Burger's daughter.
title: Burger's Daughter

claim_translated: Nå som hun ikke har noen intensjon om å overholde avtalen i passet sitt, som var å returnere til Sør-Afrika innen et år, presenterer hun seg åpent som Burgers datter.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Dette tiltrekker seg medienes oppmerksomhet, og hun deltar på flere politiske arrangementer.

claim: He decides to postpone his quest to find the Black Monster to save Shana.

claim_translated: Han bestemmer seg for å utsette søket etter det svarte monsteret for å redde Shana.

claim: None of the warnings resulted in immediate disciplinary action; they only affected the officers' chances of promotion.

claim: The storm moved north-northeastward and reached its peak intensity early on June 2 with winds of 60 mph (95 km/h) and a minimum pressure of 997 mbar (29.4 inHg).

claim_translated: Stormen beveget seg nord-nordøstover og nådde sin maksimale intensitet tidlig 2. juni med vindhastigheter på 95 km/t og et minimumstrykk på 997 mbar.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Sterk vindskjær svekket imidlertid Barry til en tropisk lavtrykk før den nådde land på Anna Maria Island i Florida flere timer senere.

claim: Although the fireships were ready in the early hours on the 13th, contrary winds prevented their deployment.
title: HMS Emerald (1795)

subsequent_sentence: The British instead set Varsovie and Aquilon alight just after 03:00, on the orders of Captain John Bligh, after removing their crews.
previous_sentence_translated: Klokken 20.00 heiste Emerald, sammen med de andre britiske fregattene og briggene, anker og ankret opp sammen med det 74-kanoners HMS Revenge i Maumusson-passasjen sør for Oléron, mens et nytt brannskipangrep ble forberedt.
claim_translated: Selv om brannskipene var klare tidlig på morgenen den 13., forhindret motvind utplasseringen av dem.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Briter satte i stedet Varsovie og Aquilon i brann like etter klokken 03:00, etter ordre fra kaptein John Bligh, etter å ha fjernet mannskapene.

claim: When general elections were held in July 2003, the CPP won, while FUNCINPEC polled 20.8 percent of the popular vote and secured 26 out of a total of 120 parliamentary seats.

claim: Sour's producer, Dan Nigro returned to produce every track on it.

subsequent_sentence_translated: Dulles oppdager forfalskningene umiddelbart, men spiller med på lureriet, og han truer senere med å avsløre svindelen med mindre Nick har sex med ham på hotellet hans den kvelden.

claim: The canzonetta form was much used by composers of the day as a technical exercise, and is a prominent element in Monteverdi's first book of madrigals published in 1587.

claim: Abu Thabit retook Ksar es-Seghir and Asilah from Granada and Tangiers from Uthman after defeating him in a battle.

claim: Another toxin is phallolysin, which has shown some hemolytic (red blood cell–destroying) activity in vitro.

claim: Sumner was further offended when command of the dwindling number of North Carolina Continentals in the southern theater was given to Smallwood as well.

claim_translated: Sumner ble ytterligere fornærmet da kommandoen over det minkende antallet nord-carolinske kontinentalsoldater i det sørlige krigsteateret også ble gitt til Smallwood.

claim: NY 22 was then extended north along their former routes, incorporating newly improved roads between Austerlitz and Stephentown, creating the 370-mile (600 km) route that existed until 2008.

claim: DLB is dementia that occurs with "some combination of fluctuating cognition, recurrent visual hallucinations, rapid eye movement (REM) sleep behavior disorder (RBD), and parkinsonism", according to Armstrong (2019), when Parkinson's disease is not well established before the dementia occurs.

claim: A story trailer that premiered at Gamescom 2021 on 25 August revealed a link to a fictional US military website that gave further details about the game's lore, and it also previewed the game's collector edition, the Pazuzu Edition.

claim: Davidson took the lead on Tait's behalf in the controversy in 1881 between high-church proponents and evangelical opponents of ritualism; in 1882 he played an important part in discouraging Anglican overtures to the Salvation Army, an organisation in which he thought too much power was in the hands of its general.

I 1882 spilte han en viktig rolle i å motvirke anglikanske tilnærminger til Frelsesarmeen, en organisasjon der han mente at for mye makt var i hendene på dens general.

claim: The conditions that produce responses from γδ T cells are not fully understood.

previous_sentence: Gamma delta T cells (γδ T cells) possess an alternative T-cell receptor (TCR) as opposed to CD4+ and CD8+ (αβ) T cells and share the characteristics of helper T cells, cytotoxic T cells and NK cells.

claim: For example, on 20 July, two men publicly hounded Jews on Kapucínska Street during the day, one of them "publicly calling all Hlinka Guardsmen, Hlinka Party members, and partisans to unite against the Jews".

claim: He impresses her by easily brushing off her assault, and explains that for years, he has hunted demons in pursuit of the ones who killed his mother and brother.

claim: In 1795 Poland ceased to exist as a sovereign nation and throughout the 19th century remained partitioned by degrees between Prussian, Austrian and Russian empires.
title: Polish culture during World War II

claim_translated: I 1795 opphørte Polen å eksistere som en suveren nasjon, og gjennom hele 1800-tallet forble landet gradvis delt mellom det prøyssiske, østerrikske og russiske imperiet.

claim: The season turned out to be Stengel's last as Yankees manager; he indicated that his age played a role in the team's decision, saying, "I'll never make the mistake of being seventy again."
title: History of the New York Yankees

claim: The four large rooms on the first floor open from either side of the center hallway.

previous_sentence: The original house has eight large rooms, each with a fireplace framed by a wooden geometric trabeated mantelpiece with classical elements.
subsequent_sentence: They contain simple wide wood trim, including skirting boards and door frame moldings with "subtly demarcated corners".

claim: They attack Kristatos's ship and adjacent warehouse and discover Kristatos lurking near the warehouse, preparing to detonate a bomb.

subsequent_sentence_translated: Kristatos prøver å flykte, men blir drept av Bond.

claim: On April 5, 2005, Jennings informed viewers through a taped message on World News Tonight that he had been diagnosed with a final stage of lung cancer, and was starting chemotherapy treatment the following week.
title: Peter Jennings
previous_sentence: On April 1, 2005, he anchored World News Tonight for the last time; his failing health also prevented him from covering the death and funeral of Pope John Paul II.
subsequent_sentence: Although he stated his intention to continue anchoring whenever possible, the message was to be his last appearance on television.
previous_sentence_translated: 1. april 2005 var han programleder for World News Tonight for siste gang; hans sviktende helse forhindret ham også fra å dekke dødsfallet og begravelsen til pave Johannes Paul II.
claim_translated: 5. april 2005 informerte Jennings seerne gjennom en innspilt melding på World News Tonight om at han hadde fått diagnosen lungekreft i siste stadium, og at han skulle starte cellegiftbehandling uken etter.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Selv om han uttalte at han hadde til hensikt å fortsette som nyhetsoppleser når det var mulig, skulle dette bli hans siste opptreden på TV.

claim: Local sporting venues include Progressive Field, Huntington Bank Field, Rocket Arena, the Wolstein Center, and Public Auditorium.

claim_translated: Lokale sportsarenaer inkluderer Progressive Field, Huntington Bank Field, Rocket Arena, Wolstein Center og Public Auditorium.

claim: Bligh mentions in his journals that a sextant and any time-keeper was refused by the mutineers, but boatswain's mate James Morrison stated Christian handed over his personal sextant saying, "There, Captain Bligh, this is sufficient for every purpose and you know the sextant to be a good one."
title: Mutiny on the Bounty
previous_sentence: With the eighteen men who had remained loyal to Bligh, the launch was supplied with about five days' food and water and Purcell's tool chest.
subsequent_sentence: The ship's K2 chronometer was left on Bounty, but Peckover had his own pocket watch that Bligh used to keep time.

claim_translated: Bligh nevner i sine dagbøker at mytteristene nektet å gi ham en sekstant og et tidsmålingsinstrument, men båtsmannsmatros James Morrison uttalte at Christian ga ham sin personlige sekstant og sa: «Der, kaptein Bligh, dette er tilstrekkelig for alle formål, og du vet at sekstanten er god.»
subsequent_sentence_translated: Skipets K2-kronometer ble etterlatt på Bounty, men Peckover hadde sin egen lommeur som Bligh brukte til å holde tiden.

claim: Sam begs Ruby to teach him how to use his abilities, but she tells him that it is too late.

claim: Barbirolli also won warm praise from Pablo Casals, whom he had accompanied in Haydn's D major cello concerto at the same concert.
title: John Barbirolli

subsequent_sentence: He conducted a Royal Philharmonic Society concert at which Ralph Vaughan Williams was presented with the society's Gold Medal, and another RPS concert at which Gustav Mahler's music, rarely heard at that time, was given – Kindertotenlieder, with Elena Gerhardt as soloist.
previous_sentence_translated: I 1927 dirigerte han London Symphony Orchestra i en fremføring av Elgars symfoni nr. 2, etter å ha blitt bedt om å steppe inn for Sir Thomas Beecham i siste liten, og vant dermed komponistens takknemlighet.
claim_translated: Barbirolli fikk også varm ros fra Pablo Casals, som han hadde akkompagnert i Haydns cellokonsert i D-dur på samme konsert.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Han dirigerte en konsert for Royal Philharmonic Society der Ralph Vaughan Williams ble tildelt foreningens gullmedalje, og en annen RPS-konsert der Gustav Mahlers musikk, som sjelden ble spilt på den tiden, ble fremført – Kindertotenlieder, med Elena Gerhardt som solist.

claim: Frustrated with being Norrell's pupil, Strange pens a scathing review of a book outlining Norrell's theories on modern magic; in particular, Strange challenges Norrell's views of the Raven King.

claim: Despite the disapproval of both families ("What a Lovely Day for a Wedding"), Joe and Jennie marry, a wedding observed by the unhappy ghosts of Marjorie and Grandma ("Wish Them Well").

claim: Angelou became mute for almost five years, believing she was to blame for his death; as she stated: "I thought, my voice killed him; I killed that man, because I told his name.

claim_translated: Angelou ble stum i nesten fem år, i den tro at hun var skyld i hans død; som hun sa: "Jeg tenkte, min stemme drepte ham; jeg drepte den mannen, fordi jeg fortalte navnet hans."
subsequent_sentence_translated: Og så tenkte jeg at jeg aldri ville snakke igjen, for stemmen min ville drept hvem som helst.

claim: However, when Issun gets everyone to believe in Amaterasu before the fifth and final round, she changes into her most powerful form and battles Yami, vanquishing him forever.

claim: Studies have shown that around 27% of the diet of M. birostris is from the surface, while around 73% is at deeper depths.
title: Manta ray
previous_sentence: With a diameter of 15 m (49 ft), these cyclones consist of up to 150 mantas and last up to an hour.

subsequent_sentence_translated: Mantaer kan beite på havbunnen med kefalofinnene spredt fra hverandre.

claim: After attempting to grow ten thousand stalks of corn in a greenhouse, which only grew two feet tall, Nutter was forced to rely primarily on digital corn.

subsequent_sentence: Faux corn was also flown in from Arizona.
previous_sentence_translated: David Nutter hyret inn Thomas Special Effects for å lage digitale maisåkre til pilotepisoden.

claim: A particular creek near Wausau met the requirements for the legend, and Majak murdered Em near it in a ritual to extend his life.
title: Revival (comics)
previous_sentence: When he began to notice his growing frailty, he researched a legend of immortality from India.

claim: The historian Mark A. Lause rejects the numbers reported by the Confederates and suggests the Union figure is too low due to not accurately counting militia strength, suggesting a more accurate figure would be about 650.
title: Battle of Glasgow, Missouri
previous_sentence: Some Confederate sources claimed as many as 1,000 Union soldiers were captured at Glasgow, and Union reports provide a figure of 550.
subsequent_sentence: Reports of Union wounded give a maximum number of 32 wounded and 8 to 11 killed, although Lause believes that this figure for wounded is improbably low, likely due to omitting militia losses, and states that about four dozen would be a better estimate.
previous_sentence_translated: Noen konfødererte kilder hevdet at så mange som 1000 unionsoldater ble tatt til fange i Glasgow, og unionsrapporter oppgir et tall på 550.
claim_translated: Historikeren Mark A. Lause avviser tallene som ble rapportert av konføderasjonen, og antyder at tallet for Unionen er for lavt fordi det ikke teller styrken til militsen nøyaktig, og antyder at et mer nøyaktig tall ville være rundt 650.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Rapporter om sårede i unionshæren oppgir et maksimum antall på 32 sårede og 8 til 11 drepte, selv om Lause mener at dette tallet for sårede er usannsynlig lavt, sannsynligvis på grunn av at tapene i militsen ikke er medregnet, og oppgir at rundt fire dusin ville være et bedre anslag.

claim: Many evacuees also checked into hotels, with rooms completely booked as far north as Ocala.
title: Hurricane Andrew
previous_sentence: Overall, almost 1.2 million people evacuated, which contributed to the low number of fatalities, despite the intensity of the storm.
subsequent_sentence: Ultimately, the sheer number of evacuees led to likely the largest traffic jam in the history of Florida, mostly along Interstate 95.
previous_sentence_translated: Totalt ble nesten 1,2 millioner mennesker evakuert, noe som bidro til det lave antallet dødsfall, til tross for stormens intensitet.
claim_translated: Mange evakuerte sjekket også inn på hoteller, og rommene var fullbooket så langt nord som Ocala.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Til syvende og sist førte det store antallet evakuerte til det som sannsynligvis var den største trafikkorken i Floridas historie, hovedsakelig langs Interstate 95.

claim: In the same video, Spike mentions that she bought out her mother's hair salon and comments on the "weird déjà vu" of Emma now attending Degrassi; Snake also appears and notes that he is a teacher at the titular school, and still single.

claim: Henry Somer Gullett and Richard Casey, who had served with Blamey at Gallipoli and in France, put Blamey's name forward to Prime Minister Joseph Lyons as a possible commander in chief in the event of a major war.

subsequent_sentence_translated: «Vi har noen strålende stabsmedarbeidere», sa Casey til Lyons, «men Blamey er en kommandør.»

claim: It gave us that Calgary identity, that Western Canadian flavor."

claim: One of the oldest organised systems of medicine is known from ancient India in the form of Ayurveda, which originated around 1500 BCE from Atharvaveda (one of the four most ancient books of Indian knowledge, wisdom and culture).

claim: Several nests close to each other may occur in the same breeding lake.

claim: Originally, Fincher envisaged the film's soundtrack to be composed of 40 cues of vintage music spanning the nearly three decades of the Zodiac story.

claim: One of the speakers for the first position was the bishop of Buenos Aires, Benito Lue y Riega, leader of the local church, who said:

claim: Rivadavia was converted to use fuel oil instead of coal and had "a general machinery overhaul".

claim: Stonewall (officially Stonewall Equality Limited) is an LGBTQ rights charity in the United Kingdom, founded in 1989 and named after the Stonewall Inn because of the Stonewall riots.

claim: François Cauche in 1651 briefly mentioned "white, black and red turtle doves", encountered in 1638, which is thought to be the first unequivocal mention of the bird.

claim: Slough may mean a place of deep mud or mire, a swamp, a river inlet or backwater, or a creek in a marsh or tide flat.

claim: McQueen's work was highly autobiographical: he incorporated elements of his memories, feelings, and family history into his designs and runway shows.

claim: They compare them, see that they are identical and, together with Mistress Quickly and Nannetta Ford, resolve to punish Falstaff.
title: Falstaff (opera)
previous_sentence: Alice and Meg have received Falstaff's letters.
subsequent_sentence: Meanwhile, Bardolfo and Pistola warn Ford of Falstaff's plan.
previous_sentence_translated: Alice og Meg har mottatt Falstaffs brev.
claim_translated: De sammenligner dem, ser at de er identiske, og bestemmer seg, sammen med Mistress Quickly og Nannetta Ford, for å straffe Falstaff.
subsequent_sentence_translated: I mellomtiden advarer Bardolfo og Pistola Ford om Falstaffs plan.

claim: Chilean devil ray (M. tarapacana)
title: Manta ray
claim_translated: Chilensk djevelrokke (M. tarapacana)

claim: When the theme of the slower middle section (technically called the "trio") of the first march came into his head, he told his friend Dora Penny, "I've got a tune that will knock 'em – will knock 'em flat".
title: Edward Elgar
previous_sentence: It is familiar to millions of television viewers all over the world every year who watch the Last Night of the Proms, where it is traditionally performed.
subsequent_sentence: When the first march was played in 1901 at a London Promenade Concert, it was conducted by Henry Wood, who later wrote that the audience "rose and yelled... the one and only time in the history of the Promenade concerts that an orchestral item was accorded a double encore."
previous_sentence_translated: Den er kjent for millioner av TV-seere over hele verden hvert år som ser på Last Night of the Proms, der den tradisjonelt fremføres.
claim_translated: Da temaet for den langsommere midtdelen (teknisk kalt «trioen») av den første marsjen dukket opp i hodet hans, sa han til vennen sin Dora Penny: «Jeg har en melodi som vil slå dem – slå dem helt i bakken».
subsequent_sentence_translated: Da den første marsjen ble spilt i 1901 på en London Promenade-konsert, ble den dirigert av Henry Wood, som senere skrev at publikum «reiste seg og ropte ... den eneste gangen i Promenade-konsertenes historie at et orkesterstykke fikk en dobbel ekstranummer.»

claim: The Assembly passed a resolution that "With effect from the day following the close of the present session of the Assembly, the League of Nations shall cease to exist except for the sole purpose of the liquidation of its affairs as provided in the present resolution."
title: League of Nations
subsequent_sentence: A Board of Liquidation consisting of nine persons from different countries spent the next 15 months overseeing the transfer of the League's assets and functions to the United Nations or specialised bodies, finally dissolving itself on 31 July 1947.
claim_translated: Forsamlingen vedtok en resolusjon om at «Med virkning fra dagen etter avslutningen av forsamlingens nåværende sesjon, skal Folkeforbundet opphøre å eksistere, med unntak av det ene formål å avvikle sine saker som fastsatt i denne resolusjonen.»
subsequent_sentence_translated: Et avviklingsstyre bestående av ni personer fra forskjellige land brukte de neste 15 månedene på å føre tilsyn med overføringen av Folkeforbundets eiendeler og funksjoner til De forente nasjoner eller spesialiserte organer, og oppløste seg selv 31. juli 1947.

claim: After experiencing a nightmare of Murphy's death during maintenance, RoboCop encounters Lewis, who addresses him as Murphy.
title: RoboCop
previous_sentence: Lewis suspects that he is Murphy, recognizing the unique way he holsters his gun (a trick Murphy learned to impress his son).
subsequent_sentence: While on patrol, RoboCop arrests Antonowsky, who recognizes Murphy's mannerisms, furthering RoboCop's recall.
previous_sentence_translated: Lewis mistenker at han er Murphy, og gjenkjenner den unike måten han hylsterer pistolen sin på (et triks Murphy lærte for å imponere sønnen sin).
claim_translated: Etter å ha opplevd et mareritt om Murphys død under vedlikehold, møter RoboCop Lewis, som tiltaler ham som Murphy.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Mens han er på patrulje, arresterer RoboCop Antonowsky, som gjenkjenner Murphys væremåte, noe som forsterker RoboCops hukommelse.

claim: She moves around the room browsing through his possessions, brushes her teeth with his toothbrush and declines to take the bath he had run for her.
title: Hotel Chevalier
previous_sentence: He closes the door and asks how she found him; she replies that it "wasn't actually that hard".
previous_sentence_translated: Han lukker døren og spør hvordan hun fant ham; hun svarer at det «egentlig ikke var så vanskelig».
claim_translated: Hun beveger seg rundt i rommet og kikker på eiendelene hans, pusser tennene med tannbørsten hans og nekter å ta det badekaret han hadde fylt opp for henne.

claim: Lupin joins the couple for their annual holiday week in Broadstairs, but relationships are strained by Lupin's "fast" habits.
title: The Diary of a Nobody
previous_sentence: He has been dismissed from his bank post for idleness; although dismayed, Pooter sees this as a chance to get his son into Perkupp's.
subsequent_sentence: On their return, Pooter's efforts to find Lupin a job at first prove fruitless.
previous_sentence_translated: Han har blitt avskjediget fra bankjobben sin på grunn av latskap; selv om han er forferdet, ser Pooter dette som en sjanse til å få sønnen sin inn hos Perkupp.
claim_translated: Lupin blir med paret på deres årlige ferieuke i Broadstairs, men forholdet blir anstrengt av Lupins «raske» vaner.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Da de kom tilbake, viste Pooters forsøk på å finne en jobb til Lupin seg først å være resultatløse.

claim: Robert [...] was born to play the role; he's quintessentially English with chiselled public schoolboy good looks".
title: Robert Pattinson
previous_sentence: According to Newell, "Cedric exemplifie all that you would expect the Hogwarts champion to be.
subsequent_sentence: Pattinson learned to scuba dive in preparation for the role.
previous_sentence_translated: Ifølge Newell «representerer Cedric alt man forventer av en Hogwarts-mester».
claim_translated: Robert [...] var født til å spille rollen; han er selve essensen av en engelskmann med et utseende som skapt for privatskoler.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Pattinson lærte å dykke som forberedelse til rollen.

claim: Both men supported Rutherford, but neither was enthusiastic about doing so.
title: Alexander Cameron Rutherford
previous_sentence: Talbot was Laurier's preferred candidate, but he expected to be appointed to the Senate and found the latter prospect more congenial than serving as Premier of Alberta.
subsequent_sentence: In August, Bulyea was appointed Alberta's first Lieutenant-Governor and later that month the Alberta Liberals selected Rutherford as their first leader.
previous_sentence_translated: Talbot var Lauriers foretrukne kandidat, men han forventet å bli utnevnt til Senatet og syntes det siste alternativet var mer tiltalende enn å tjene som premier i Alberta.
claim_translated: Begge mennene støttet Rutherford, men ingen av dem var entusiastiske over å gjøre det.
subsequent_sentence_translated: I august ble Bulyea utnevnt til Albertas første viseguvernør, og senere samme måned valgte Albertas liberale Rutherford som sin første leder.

claim: Cubs also face threats from wolves and adult male bears.
title: Polar bear
previous_sentence: Cubs will eventually starve if their mothers cannot kill enough prey.
subsequent_sentence: Males kill cubs to bring their mother back into estrus but also kill young outside the breeding season for food.
previous_sentence_translated: Valpene vil til slutt sulte i hjel hvis mødrene deres ikke klarer å drepe nok byttedyr.
claim_translated: Valper står også overfor trusler fra ulver og voksne hannbjørner.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Hanner dreper unger for å få moren i brunst igjen, men dreper også unger utenom hekkesesongen for å få mat.

claim: Super Mario 64 successors include Super Mario Sunshine for the GameCube and Super Mario Galaxy for the Wii, building on its core design of power-ups and its 3D, open-ended gameplay.
title: Super Mario 64
subsequent_sentence: Super Mario Galaxy 2 includes a remake of Super Mario 64's Whomp's Fortress level called Throwback Galaxy.
claim_translated: Super Mario 64s etterfølgere inkluderer Super Mario Sunshine for GameCube og Super Mario Galaxy for Wii, som bygger på kjernedesignet med power-ups og 3D-spill med åpen slutt.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Super Mario Galaxy 2 inkluderer en nyversjon av Super Mario 64s Whomp's Fortress-nivå kalt Throwback Galaxy.

claim: Outside India, 14 Reels Entertainment distributed Eega and Naan Ee in association with Ficus, Inc.
title: Eega
previous_sentence: Global distribution rights for the Telugu version were sold for ₹34 crore (US$6.24 million), and PVP Cinema acquired Naan Ee's distribution rights for ₹5 crore.
subsequent_sentence: Reliance Entertainment acquired Makkhi's distribution rights.
previous_sentence_translated: De globale distribusjonsrettighetene for Telugu-versjonen ble solgt for ₹34 crore (6,24 millioner USD), og PVP Cinema kjøpte Naan Ees distribusjonsrettigheter for ₹5 crore.
claim_translated: Utenfor India distribuerte 14 Reels Entertainment Eega og Naan Ee i samarbeid med Ficus, Inc.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Reliance Entertainment kjøpte distribusjonsrettighetene til Makkhi.

claim: The United States voted to annex Texas as the 28th state in March 1845.
title: Texas Revolution
subsequent_sentence: Two months later, Mexico agreed to recognize the Republic of Texas as long as there was no annexation to the United States.
claim_translated: USA stemte for å annektere Texas som den 28. staten i mars 1845.
subsequent_sentence_translated: To måneder senere gikk Mexico med på å anerkjenne Republikken Texas så lenge det ikke ble noen annektering til USA.

claim: Every evening, they are delighted by the sound of a distant train's whistle.
title: Pather Panchali
previous_sentence: Together, they share life's simple joys: sitting quietly under a tree, viewing pictures in a travelling vendor's bioscope, running after the candy man who passes through, and watching a jatra (folk theatre) performed by an acting troupe.
previous_sentence_translated: Sammen deler de livets enkle gleder: å sitte stille under et tre, se på bilder i en omreisende selgers bioscope, løpe etter godterimannen som passerer forbi, og se en jatra (folkeopptreden) fremført av en skuespillertropp.
claim_translated: Hver kveld gleder de seg over lyden av et fjernt togfløytesignal.

claim: A 2012 report of the Darjeeling Municipality Waterworks Department stated that from the 1930s little or no maintenance had been undertaken on the water pipeline from Senchal.
title: Darjeeling
subsequent_sentence: Engineers in the department suggested that there might be up to 35% transmission loss, and more within Darjeeling.
claim_translated: En rapport fra 2012 fra Darjeeling kommunes vannverk avdeling uttalte at det fra 1930-tallet var blitt utført lite eller ingen vedlikehold på vannrørledningen fra Senchal.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Ingeniører i avdelingen antydet at det kunne være opptil 35 % overføringstap, og mer i Darjeeling.

claim: A Wii console in the backwards compatibility mode is restricted to GameCube functionality, and a GameCube controller is required to play and a GameCube memory card.
title: Wii
previous_sentence: The original launch Wii consoles are backward-compatible with all GameCube software, memory cards, and controllers, although Korean Wii consoles do not have backward compatibility.
subsequent_sentence: Because of the lack of the expansion port on the Wii, devices using the expansion port, such as the GameCube Broadband Adapter and Modem Adapter and the Game Boy Player do not work.
previous_sentence_translated: De originale Wii-konsollene er bakoverkompatible med all GameCube-programvare, minnekort og kontrollere, selv om koreanske Wii-konsoller ikke har bakoverkompatibilitet.
claim_translated: En Wii-konsoll i bakoverkompatibilitetsmodus er begrenset til GameCube-funksjonalitet, og en GameCube-kontroller er nødvendig for å spille, samt et GameCube-minnekort.
subsequent_sentence_translated: På grunn av mangelen på utvidelsesporten på Wii, fungerer ikke enheter som bruker utvidelsesporten, for eksempel GameCube Broadband Adapter og Modem Adapter og Game Boy Player.

claim: All issues written by Greg Rucka and illustrated by Michael Lark unless otherwise stated.
title: Lazarus (comics)
claim_translated: Alle utgaver skrevet av Greg Rucka og illustrert av Michael Lark, med mindre annet er oppgitt.

claim: This came at a high price.
title: Relief of Douglas MacArthur
previous_sentence: For his part, Westmoreland and his senior colleagues were eager to avoid any hint of dissent or challenge to presidential authority.
subsequent_sentence: In his 1998 book Dereliction of Duty: Lyndon Johnson, Robert McNamara, the Joint Chiefs of Staff, and the Lies That Led to Vietnam, then-Lieutenant Colonel H. R. McMaster argued that the Joint Chiefs failed in their duty to provide the President, Secretary of Defense Robert McNamara or Congress with frank and fearless professional advice.
previous_sentence_translated: Westmoreland og hans overordnede kolleger var på sin side ivrige etter å unngå ethvert snev av dissens eller utfordring av presidentens autoritet.
claim_translated: Dette kom til en høy pris.
subsequent_sentence_translated: I sin bok fra 1998, «Dereliction of Duty: Lyndon Johnson, Robert McNamara, the Joint Chiefs of Staff, and the Lies That Led to Vietnam», argumenterte daværende oberstløytnant H. R. McMaster for at Joint Chiefs of Staff sviktet i sin plikt til å gi presidenten, forsvarsminister Robert McNamara eller Kongressen ærlige og fryktløse faglige råd.

claim: In recent years, Lukather was in a relationship with Amber Thayer (née Peek), ex-wife of Kiss guitarist Tommy Thayer.
title: Steve Lukather
claim_translated: De siste årene var Lukather i et forhold med Amber Thayer (født Peek), ekskona til Kiss-gitaristen Tommy Thayer.

claim: The high points on both sides of the coin (the eagle's head and the wreath) opposed each other, and it was difficult to get the design to be brought out fully in the tough copper-nickel alloy.
title: Indian Head cent
previous_sentence: By 1858, Mint authorities found the piece unsatisfactory in production.
subsequent_sentence: Mint Engraver James B. Longacre, designer of the Flying Eagle cent, was instructed to develop alternative designs.
previous_sentence_translated: I 1858 fant myntmyndighetene produksjonen av mynten utilfredsstillende.
claim_translated: Høydepunktene på begge sider av mynten (ørnens hode og kransen) sto mot hverandre, og det var vanskelig å få designet til å komme helt frem i den tøffe kobber-nikkel-legeringen.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Myntgravør James B. Longacre, designeren av Flying Eagle-centen, fikk beskjed om å utvikle alternative design.

claim: While Bell is sometimes recognized as the authority for Rhinolophidae, the authority is more often given as Gray, 1825.
title: Horseshoe bat
previous_sentence: English zoologist Thomas Bell is credited as the first to recognize horseshoe bats as a separate family, using Rhinolophidae in 1836.
subsequent_sentence: Horseshoe bats are in the superfamily Rhinolophoidea, along with Craseonycteridae, Hipposideridae Megadermatidae, Rhinonycteridae, and Rhinopomatidae.
previous_sentence_translated: Den engelske zoologen Thomas Bell er kreditert som den første som anerkjente hestesko-flaggermus som en egen familie, ved å bruke Rhinolophidae i 1836.
claim_translated: Selv om Bell noen ganger anerkjennes som autoriteten for Rhinolophidae, er autoriteten oftere oppgitt som Gray, 1825.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Hesteskoflaggermus er i superfamilien Rhinolophoidea, sammen med Craseonycteridae, Hipposideridae, Megadermatidae, Rhinonycteridae og Rhinopomatidae.

claim: Nash referred to Singletary as a "protégé" of Travis's with a "sonorous baritone".
title: Randy Travis
previous_sentence: After Singletary signed a recording contract with Giant Records in 1995, Travis co-produced Singletary's self-titled debut album.
subsequent_sentence: Josh Turner cites Travis as an influence, and said that "Diggin' Up Bones" was the first song he performed in public.
previous_sentence_translated: Etter at Singletary signerte en platekontrakt med Giant Records i 1995, var Travis medprodusent på Singletarys selvtitulerte debutalbum.
claim_translated: Nash omtalte Singletary som en «protégé» av Travis med en «klangfull baryton».

title: Polar bear

claim: Similar to the Nomai, the unnamed species that built the Stranger also came to the Hearthian system after discovering the Eye of the Universe's signals, forming a religion around it and ravaging their homeworld moon to build the Stranger.
title: Outer Wilds
subsequent_sentence: Upon reaching the system and discovering that the Eye heralded the end of the universe, they destroyed their monuments to the Eye and constructed a device to block its signal from other races.
claim_translated: I likhet med Nomai kom den navnløse arten som bygde Stranger også til Hearthian-systemet etter å ha oppdaget signalene fra Universets øye, og dannet en religion rundt det og herjet månen på hjemmeplaneten sin for å bygge Stranger.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Da de nådde systemet og oppdaget at Øyet varslet slutten på universet, ødela de monumentene sine til Øyet og konstruerte en enhet for å blokkere signalet fra andre raser.

claim: Leaving aside formation from the accretion disk surrounding the white dwarf, there are two ways a planet could end in a close orbit around stars of this kind: by surviving being engulfed by the star during its red giant phase, and then spiralling inward, or inward migration after the white dwarf has formed.
title: White dwarf
previous_sentence: Another suggested constraint to this idea is the origin of those planets.
subsequent_sentence: The former case is implausible for low-mass bodies, as they are unlikely to survive being absorbed by their stars.
previous_sentence_translated: En annen foreslått begrensning for denne ideen er opprinnelsen til disse planetene.
claim_translated: Hvis vi ser bort fra dannelse fra akkresjonsskiven som omgir den hvite dvergen, er det to måter en planet kan ende opp i en nær bane rundt stjerner av denne typen: ved å overleve å bli oppslukt av stjernen under dens røde kjempefase, og deretter spiralere innover, eller innovermigrering etter at den hvite dvergen er dannet.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Det førstnevnte tilfellet er usannsynlig for objekter med lav masse, ettersom det er lite sannsynlig at de overlever å bli absorbert av stjernene sine.

claim: In Europe, in addition to B. edulis (or cèpe de Bordeaux), the most popular are:
title: Boletus edulis

claim_translated: I Europa er de mest populære, i tillegg til B. edulis (eller cèpe de Bordeaux):

claim: The group reaches the rendezvous but are ambushed by Umbrella forces.
title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
previous_sentence: Dr. Ashford informs Alice of an extraction point with a waiting helicopter.
subsequent_sentence: Cain kills Dr. Ashford and compels Alice, revealed to be enhanced by the T-virus, to fight Nemesis.
previous_sentence_translated: Dr. Ashford informerer Alice om et evakueringspunkt med et ventende helikopter.
claim_translated: Gruppen når frem til møtestedet, men blir overfalt av Umbrella-styrker.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Cain dreper Dr. Ashford og tvinger Alice, som viser seg å være forsterket av T-viruset, til å kjempe mot Nemesis.

claim: Christ lag in Todes Banden is the only exception, but was most likely composed not for Arnstadt but for an application to a more important post at the church of Divi Blasii in Mühlhausen.
title: Christ lag in Todes Banden, BWV 4
previous_sentence: Therefore, most cantatas of the period are not for Sunday occasions, but restricted to special occasions such as weddings and funerals.
previous_sentence_translated: Derfor er de fleste kantater fra denne perioden ikke for søndagsanledninger, men begrenset til spesielle anledninger som bryllup og begravelser.
claim_translated: «Christ lag in Todes Banden» er det eneste unntaket, men ble mest sannsynlig ikke komponert for Arnstadt, men for en søknad til en viktigere stilling ved Divi Blasii-kirken i Mühlhausen.

claim: The official definition by the Mexican lucha libre commission for the light heavyweight division in Mexico is between 92 kg (203 lb) and 97 kg (214 lb).
title: CMLL World Light Heavyweight Championship
subsequent_sentence: In the 20th century, CMLL were generally consistent and strict about enforcing the actual weight limits.
claim_translated: Den offisielle definisjonen fra den meksikanske lucha libre-kommisjonen for lett tungvekt i Mexico er mellom 92 kg (203 lb) og 97 kg (214 lb).
subsequent_sentence_translated: På 1900-tallet var CMLL generelt konsekvente og strenge når det gjaldt å håndheve de faktiske vektgrensene.

claim: Joe has been offered the position of physician-in-chief at the Chicago hospital, replacing Denby, who is taking an executive position, or as the elder doctor terms it, being "kicked upstairs".
title: Allegro (musical)
previous_sentence: As Joe sits, head in hands, his late mother and a chorus of the friends he left behind appeal to him to return ("Come Home").
subsequent_sentence: At a dedication of a new pavilion at the hospital, Joe has a revelation and shifts the path of his life; as he does so, Grandma appears and calls for Marjorie to come watch, an echo of the scene in which he learned to walk.
previous_sentence_translated: Mens Joe sitter med hodet i hendene, appellerer hans avdøde mor og et kor av venner han har etterlatt seg til ham om å komme tilbake («Come Home»).
claim_translated: Joe har blitt tilbudt stillingen som overlege ved sykehuset i Chicago, og erstatter dermed Denby, som skal ta en lederstilling, eller som den eldre legen uttrykker det, bli «sparket oppover».
subsequent_sentence_translated: Ved innvielsen av en ny paviljong på sykehuset får Joe en åpenbaring og endrer livsbanen sin. Idet han gjør det, dukker bestemor opp og ber Marjorie om å komme og se på, et ekko av scenen der han lærte å gå.

claim: A 2001 article on Fauré in Baker's Biographical Dictionary of Musicians concludes thus:
title: Gabriel Fauré

claim: In January 1155 Theobald helped to secure the Chancellorship for his protégé, Thomas Becket, an action that Barlow speculates happened because Theobald hoped to secure more influence with the king through Becket.
title: Theobald of Bec
previous_sentence: For most of the remainder of Theobald's life he was occupied with ecclesiastical affairs in his diocese, as well as attending the royal court when Henry was in England.
subsequent_sentence: If this was his hope, Barlow notes that it did not materialise.
previous_sentence_translated: I mesteparten av resten av Theobalds liv var han opptatt med kirkelige anliggender i bispedømmet sitt, i tillegg til å delta ved hoffet når Henrik var i England.
claim_translated: I januar 1155 bidro Theobald til å sikre kanslervervet for sin protesjé, Thomas Becket, en handling som Barlow spekulerer i skjedde fordi Theobald håpet å sikre seg mer innflytelse hos kongen gjennom Becket.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Hvis dette var hans håp, bemerker Barlow at det ikke ble noe av.

claim: This was roughly the number of people living there on May 30, 1948, when a flood broke through Vanport's western levee.
title: Columbia Slough
previous_sentence: After the war, the population fell to about 18,500.
subsequent_sentence: The break occurred during the afternoon of a day with mild weather.
previous_sentence_translated: Etter krigen falt befolkningen til rundt 18 500.
claim_translated: Dette var omtrent antall mennesker som bodde der 30. mai 1948, da en flom brøt gjennom Vanports vestlige diket.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Bruddet skjedde på ettermiddagen på en dag med mildt vær.

claim: In 2016 an appeal by Jetmir Buçpapa to serve the rest of his sentence in Albania was rejected by the Secretary of State for Justice.
title: Securitas depot robbery
subsequent_sentence: The following year on judicial review the decision was found to be irrational.
claim_translated: I 2016 ble en anke fra Jetmir Buçpapa om å sone resten av straffen sin i Albania avvist av justisministeren.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Året etter ble avgjørelsen funnet å være irrasjonell ved rettslig overprøving.

claim: Despite the praise it has received, the pavilion has its blemishes: the supporting north side of the structure along Randolph Street has attracted criticism for not being pleasing to the eye, and some observers found the exposed supporting proscenium braces offensive.
title: Jay Pritzker Pavilion
subsequent_sentence: Critic Fred Bernstein of The New York Times felt that the smooth rounded trellis and sharp-edged bandshell were geometrically discordant.
claim_translated: Til tross for rosen den har fått, har paviljongen sine skjønnhetsfeil: den støttende nordsiden av konstruksjonen langs Randolph Street har blitt kritisert for ikke å være tiltalende for øyet, og noen observatører syntes de synlige støttende prosceniumstagene var støtende.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Kritikeren Fred Bernstein i The New York Times mente at det glatte, avrundede espalieret og det skarptkantede musikkpaviljongen var geometrisk usamstemmende.

claim: Aboard the Sulaco, the queen, stowed away in the dropship's landing gear, attacks the group.
title: Aliens (film)
subsequent_sentence: The queen rips Bishop in half and advances on Newt, but Ripley battles the creature using an exosuit cargo loader, expelling it into space through an airlock while the damaged Bishop shields Newt.
claim_translated: Om bord på Sulaco angriper dronningen, som har gjemt seg i landingsutstyret til landingsfartøyet, gruppen.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Dronningen river Bishop i to og går mot Newt, men Ripley kjemper mot skapningen ved hjelp av en eksoskjelett-lastelaster og sender den ut i verdensrommet gjennom en luftsluse mens den skadede Bishop beskytter Newt.

claim: The campaign was set up to remember Anning in her hometown of Lyme Regis by erecting a statue and creating a learning legacy in her name.
title: Mary Anning
previous_sentence: In August 2018, a campaign called "Mary Anning Rocks" was formed by an 11-year-old schoolgirl from Dorset, Evie Swire, supported by her mother Anya Pearson.
subsequent_sentence: A crowdfunding campaign began but was put on hold due to the COVID-19 pandemic in the United Kingdom; it resumed in November 2020.
previous_sentence_translated: I august 2018 ble en kampanje kalt «Mary Anning Rocks» dannet av en 11 år gammel skolejente fra Dorset, Evie Swire, støttet av moren Anya Pearson.

claim: Hemingway has said he believes this avoidance made the heart and thrust of the story all the more acute, writing "'Big Two-Hearted River' is about a boy beat to the wide coming home from the war.... beat to the wide was an earlier and possibly more severe form of beat, since those who had been were unable to comment on this condition and could not suffer that it be mentioned in their presence.

claim: It is possible that while Luther later saw the 31 October letter to Albert as the beginning of the Reformation, he did not post the Theses to the church door until mid-November, but he may not have posted them on the door at all.

subsequent_sentence_translated: Uansett var tesene godt kjent blant den intellektuelle eliten i Wittenberg kort tid etter at Luther sendte dem til Albert.

claim: Accolade's case was further hurt by a presentation by a Sega engineer named Takeshi Nagashima, who showed two Sega game cartridges that were able to run on the Genesis III without the trademark-displaying TMSS, and offered them to Accolade's defense team but would not reveal how that was possible.

subsequent_sentence: Ultimately, this would result in Accolade's defeat on April 3, 1992, when Judge Caulfield ruled in favor of Sega and issued an injunction prohibiting future sales by Accolade of Genesis-compatible games incorporating the Sega message or using the results of the reverse engineering.

claim_translated: Accolades sak ble ytterligere svekket av en presentasjon av en Sega-ingeniør ved navn Takeshi Nagashima, som viste frem to Sega-spillkassetter som kunne kjøres på Genesis III uten TMSS, som viser varemerket, og tilbød dem til Accolades forsvarsteam, men ville ikke avsløre hvordan det var mulig.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Dette resulterte til slutt i at Accolade tapte saken 3. april 1992, da dommer Caulfield avsa dom i Segas favør og utstedte et påbud som forbød Accolade å selge Genesis-kompatible spill som inneholdt Sega-meldingen eller brukte resultatene av den omvendte utviklingen.

claim: Treatments included peripheral nerve stimulation, electrical muscle stimulation and electric shock therapy.

previous_sentence_translated: I sin elektroterapi brukte Bird både elektrokjemiske og elektrostatiske maskiner (og senere også elektromagnetiske induksjonsmaskiner) for å behandle et svært bredt spekter av tilstander, som for eksempel noen former for chorea.
claim_translated: Behandlingene inkluderte perifer nervestimulering, elektrisk muskelstimulering og elektrokonvulsiv terapi.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Bird brukte også oppfinnelsen sin, den elektriske moxaen, til å behandle hudsår.

claim: However, agents of Rome have been plotting to banish the mistress from Naples.

claim: Falstaff, pleased to find himself not the only dupe, proclaims that all the world is folly, and all are figures of fun ("Tutto nel mondo è burla... Tutti gabbati!... claim: Actors portraying zombies spent four days training with choreographers at a zombie "boot camp" to make sure they all had consistent behavior and movements.

claim: Yet this is precisely what director Rudolph Cartier has done.

claim: If the first term in this series is the area of the triangle, then the second is the sum of the areas of two triangles whose bases are the two smaller secant lines, and whose third vertex is where the line that is parallel to the parabola's axis and that passes through the midpoint of the base intersects the parabola, and so on.
title: Archimedes
subsequent_sentence: This proof uses a variation of the series 1/4 + 1/16 + 1/64 + 1/256 + · · · which sums to ⁠1/3⁠.
claim_translated: Hvis det første leddet i denne serien er arealet av trekanten, så er det andre summen av arealene til to trekanter hvis baser er de to mindre sekantlinjene, og hvis tredje toppunkt er der linjen som er parallell med parabelens akse og som går gjennom midtpunktet av basen skjærer parabolen, og så videre.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Dette beviset bruker en variant av serien 1/4 + 1/16 + 1/64 + 1/256 + · · · som summerer til 1/3.

claim: Al-Ya'qubi (d. 839) noted Sulayman razed the houses of Lydda's inhabitants to force their relocation to Ramla and punished those who resisted.
title: Sulayman ibn Abd al-Malik
previous_sentence: Although the traditional accounts are in agreement that Lydda almost immediately fell into obscurity following the founding of Ramla, narratives vary about the extent of Sulayman's efforts to transfer Lydda's inhabitants to Ramla, some holding that he only demolished a church in Lydda and others that he demolished the city altogether.
subsequent_sentence: In the words of al-Jahshiyari, Sulayman "founded the town of al-Ramla and its mosque and thus caused the ruin of Lod
previous_sentence_translated: Selv om de tradisjonelle beretningene er enige om at Lydda nesten umiddelbart falt i glemsel etter grunnleggelsen av Ramla, varierer fortellingene om omfanget av Sulaymans innsats for å overføre Lyddas innbyggere til Ramla. claim: Todd Edwards wrote nine original songs for the film and sung four of them: "Critters Have Feelings", "Tree Critter", "Eva Deanna", and "Glow"."Eva Deanna" was written about a day that he and his wife spent at the zoo with their niece, the daughter of associate producer Katie Hooten."Glow" was written about the Edwards siblings' grandmother, Vera, who had died a few years earlier."Great Big World" was sung by Anne Hathaway and replaced another song called "Woods Go-Round", which Edwards considered too childish and described as being "in the vein of Saturday morning cartoons."

previous_sentence_translated: Marshall vant myntkastet, valgte å serve først og ble umiddelbart brutt av Gore.
claim_translated: Etter at Gore vant det første settet, begynte det å regne i et kvarter; dette gjorde bakken enda mykere og påvirket kvaliteten på spillet.
subsequent_sentence_translated: Finalen varte i 48 minutter, og Spencer Gore vant det første mesterskapet mot William Marshall i tre strake sett på henholdsvis 15, 13 og 20 minutter.

claim: He played two representative matches, for the best schoolboy cricketers, at Lord's Cricket Ground, scored 44, 91, 57 and 55 and won favourable reviews in the press.
title: Douglas Jardine
previous_sentence: Jardine's achievements in the season were widely reported in the local and national press.
subsequent_sentence: Wisden, in 1928, described Jardine at this time as being obviously of a much higher standard than his contemporaries, particularly in defence and on side batting.
previous_sentence_translated: Jardines prestasjoner i sesongen ble omtalt i vidt omfang i lokal- og ri NSPpressen.
claim_translated: Han spilte to representative kamper, for de beste skoleguttene i cricket, på Lord's Cricket Ground, scoret 44, 91, 57 og 55 og vant gunstige anmeldelser i pressen.
subsequent_sentence_translated: I 1928 beskrev Wisden Jardine som åpenbart å være av en mye høyere standard enn sine samtidige, spesielt i forsvar og sideslag.

claim: Depletion of prey species, pollution, large-scale oil spills, and habitat disturbance caused by noise and conflicts with boats are the most significant worldwide threats.
title: Orca
previous_sentence: In 2008, the IUCN (International Union for Conservation of Nature) changed its assessment of the orca's conservation status from conservation dependent to data deficient, recognizing that one or more orca types may actually be separate, endangered species.
subsequent_sentence: In January 2020, the first orca in England and Wales since 2001 was found dead with a large fragment of plastic in its stomach.
previous_sentence_translated: I 2008 endret IUCN (Den internasjonale naturvernunionen) sin vurdering av spekkhoggerens bevaringsstatus fra bevaringsavhengig til datamangel, og anerkjente at én eller flere spekkhoggerarter faktisk kan være separate, truede arter.
claim_translated: Reduksjon av byttedyr, forurensning, store oljesøl og forstyrrelser i leveområder forårsaket av støy og konflikter med båter er de viktigste truslene på verdensbasis.
subsequent_sentence_translated: I januar 2020 ble den første spekkhoggeren i England og Wales siden 2001 funnet død med et stort plastfragment i magen.

claim: On 22 November 1867 he officiated at the public execution of William Philip Allen, Michael Larkin, and Michael O'Brien, who became known as the Manchester Martyrs.
title: William Calcraft
previous_sentence: Calcraft was also reportedly nervous of executing Fenians, because of threats he had received.
subsequent_sentence: The three Fenians had been found guilty of the murder of a police officer, and were hanged together.
previous_sentence_translated: Calcraft var visstnok også nervøs for å henrette fenianere på grunn av trusler han hadde mottatt.
claim_translated: Den 22. november 1867 utførte han den offentlige henrettelsen av William Philip Allen, Michael Larkin og Michael O'Brien, som ble kjent som Manchester-martyrene.
subsequent_sentence_translated: De tre fenianerne ble funnet skyldige i drapet på en politibetjent og ble hengt sammen.

claim: Her screenplay, Georgia, Georgia (1972), was the first original script by a Black woman to be produced, and she was the first African American woman to direct a major motion picture, Down in the Delta, in 1998.
title: Maya Angelou
previous_sentence: Angelou's successful acting career included roles in numerous plays, films, and television programs, among them her appearance in the television mini-series Roots in 1977.

claim_translated: Manuset hennes, Georgia, Georgia (1972), var det første originale manuset av en svart kvinne som ble produsert, og hun var den første afroamerikanske kvinnen som regisserte en stor spillefilm, Down in the Delta, i 1998.

claim: She also displays psionic abilities after telekinetically killing a security guard.
title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
previous_sentence: Alice wakes up in an Umbrella research facility and escapes with help from Carlos, Jill, L. J., and Angela.

subsequent_sentence_translated: Idet de forlater stedet, avslører Dr. Alexander Isaacs, en høytstående Umbrella-ansatt, at Alices flukt er en del av Umbrellas plan.

claim: The pair may undertake a number of different behaviors, including bumping, chasing, and ambushing.
title: Bobcat
previous_sentence: A dominant male travels with a female and mates with her several times, generally from winter until early spring; this varies by location, but most mating takes place during February and March.
previous_sentence_translated: En dominerende hann reiser med en hunn og parer seg med henne flere ganger, vanligvis fra vinteren til tidlig på våren. Dette varierer fra sted til sted, men mesteparten av paringen skjer i februar og mars.
claim_translated: Paret kan utføre en rekke forskjellige handlinger, inkludert å støte borti hverandre, jage hverandre og ligge på lur.

claim: The women arrive and disguise Fenton as a monk, telling him that they have arranged to spoil Ford's and Caius's plans.
title: Falstaff (opera)
